Package edu.ufp.inf.sd.rmi.project.server

Interface SubjectRI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SubjectTaskImpl
    public interface SubjectRI
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This interface has all the Subject (task group) remote methods.
